backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a banking backend with user profile management and balance operations (deposit, withdraw, transfer), protected by role-based access control via AccessControl and MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that the demo user credentials in useEmailPasswordAuth.ts were updated to email 'bryanbarton45@gmail.com' and password 'alinalaura@24'.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summary file describing the purpose and key changes of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the BlueStone Bank frontend app, mounting the React app at the #root div and loading the main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component setting up TanStack Router with 8 routes (/,  /login, /register, /deposit, /withdraw, /transfer, /transactions, /accounts), email/password session auth, QueryClient, ThemeProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccountsOverview: Displays a checking account summary card with live balance fetched via useBalance, a masked account number, and an informational note about real-time balance updates.
frontend/src/components/BalanceCard.tsx: Balance display card with show/hide toggle, optional personalized welcome greeting using the userName prop, decorative styling, and a formatted currency balance.
frontend/src/components/DebitCard.tsx: Visual debit card component showing a styled card with chip, BlueStone Bank branding, toggleable card number, cardholder name, expiry, and a VISA logo.
frontend/src/components/DepositForm.tsx: A form component for depositing funds that validates the amount, shows quick-select buttons, and triggers a confirmation dialog before submitting via the useDeposit mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout wrapper providing a sticky header with navigation links and login button, a mobile hamburger menu, main content slot, and a footer with social links.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing loading state during authentication and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/MobileBalanceCar: Displays a greeting and the user's checking account balance with a toggle to show or hide the balance value, using the useBalance hook.
A fixed bottom navigation bar for mobile with Home, Accounts, Pay, and More tabs that navigate to routes or show a 'coming soon' toast for unimplemented features.
frontend/src/components/MobileQuickActio: A grid of four quick-action buttons (Deposit, Withdraw, Transfer, Pay Bills) that navigate to their respective routes or show a 'coming soon' toast.
frontend/src/components/MobileRecentTran: Shows the five most recent transactions with icons, descriptions, relative dates, and color-coded amounts, including skeleton loading states and an empty state.
frontend/src/components/MobileTopBar.tsx: A sticky mobile header displaying the BlueStone Bank brand, a notification bell with a badge, and optional logout button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects a new user's name and email on first login, validates inputs, and saves the profile via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/QuickActions.tsx: Renders a 4-button quick actions grid (Transfer, Deposit, Bill Pay, Top-up) that navigates to routes or shows a 'Coming Soon' toast for unimplemented features.
frontend/src/components/RecentTransactio: Displays a list of recent transactions with icons, amounts, and dates, showing skeletons while loading and a 'View All' link to the transactions page.
frontend/src/components/TransactionConfi: An alert dialog that shows a summary of a pending deposit, withdrawal, or transfer and lets the user confirm or cancel, with a loading spinner during processing.
frontend/src/components/TransactionFilte: Renders two Select dropdowns for filtering transactions by type (all/deposit/withdrawal/transfer) and sorting by date or amount.
frontend/src/components/TransactionTable: Displays a paginated list of transactions with icons, badges, descriptions, dates, and color-coded amounts, with an empty state when no transactions match.
frontend/src/components/TransferForm.tsx: A form for transferring funds to another user by Principal ID, with amount/principal validation, balance checking, and a confirmation dialog before executing the transfer.
frontend/src/components/VirtualCard.tsx: Renders a flippable virtual debit card UI showing cardholder name, masked card number, expiry, and a styled back face with CVV on click.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawForm.tsx: A form component for withdrawing funds that validates the amount against the available checking balance, shows a confirmation dialog, and calls the withdraw mutation with success/error toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: A hook that fetches the user's checking balance from the backend actor via React Query, returning a default balance if no data is available yet.
Provides email/password authentication utilities (login, register, session management) using localStorage with a simple djb2 hash, including a seeded demo account.
frontend/src/hooks/useFilteredTransactio: A memoized hook that filters and sorts a list of local transactions by type and a chosen sort option (date or amount, ascending or descending).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout state and identity to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query mutations for deposit, withdraw, and external transfer operations against the backend actor, invalidating the balance query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Defines transaction types and returns a static list of mock transactions (deposits, withdrawals, transfers) for UI display purposes.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to read and save a local user profile (name and email) stored in localStorage, since the backend has no profile storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind base/components/utilities, a Chase Bank-inspired CSS custom property color system for light and dark modes, and utility styles for card flip animation, balance blur, and custom scrollbar.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountsPage.tsx: Page component displaying the user's accounts overview with a navy header, back navigation to home, and a bottom nav bar.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page showing the user's balance card, debit card, quick actions, and recent transactions with a sticky top bar and bottom nav.
frontend/src/pages/DepositPage.tsx: Page wrapping the DepositForm component with a navy header and back navigation, redirecting home on success.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with email/password form that authenticates via loginWithEmailPassword and calls onLoginSuccess on valid credentials.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Registration page with a validated form for name, email, and password that creates a new account via registerWithEmailPassword and redirects to login on success.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionHistory.ts: Paginated transaction history page with type and sort filters, using useTransactions and useFilteredTransactions hooks to display results in a TransactionTable.
frontend/src/pages/TransferPage.tsx: Page wrapping the TransferForm component with a navy header and back navigation, redirecting home on success.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Page wrapping the WithdrawForm component with a navy header and back navigation, redirecting home on success.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Utility functions for formatting currency (cents to USD), timestamps (nanoseconds to readable dates), relative dates, and transaction type labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL query parameters (including hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validation functions for amount, Principal ID, and email fields, returning error message strings or empty string on success.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors (including Chase Bank tokens), fonts, border radii, shadows, and animations. Enables dark mode via class and includes the tailwindcss-animate and @tailwindcss/typography plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata and state for the BlueStone Bank app, including schema version, existing features, and a note that the demo user credentials are bryanbarton45@gmail.com / alinalaura@24.
